name: Wise Garden
description:
Features

  • A unique art style inspired by estamps and feudal japan.

  • Gardens to rake and to design wisely.

  • Multiple solutions puzzles giving you freedom and creativity.

  • An adventure depicting the cruel and sometimes absurd world of work told through weird and funny characters.

Design As You Please

Each item bring a specific constraint. You will have to place them in the garden wisely.

Be Creative !

As soon as you respect item rules, you can come up with your own solution

Begin Your Carriere

Work For Various Clients. How Far Will You Go ?
